hero.title: Expert Electronics Repair
hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable, and affordable repair services for all your electronic devices

hardware.title: Hardware Repair
hardware.description: Everything for computer components, maintenance, repair and replacement.

software.title: Software Services
software.description: Virus removal, data recovery, maintenance and software optimization.

welcome.title: Welcome to Maistor Zhichko
welcome.text: We offer accessible and reliable computer maintenance services, specializing in operating system reinstallation, data recovery, and hardware repairs. Our goal is to provide fast and effective solutions for all your technological needs, focusing on quality and customer satisfaction. With us, you can count on professionalism and attention to detail that will restore and improve your equipment's performance.

desktop.title: Desktop Computers
desktop.description: Quality software and hardware services for your desktop computer.

laptop.title: Laptops
laptop.description: Fast software and hardware services for your laptop.

dataRecovery.title: Data Recovery
dataRecovery.description: Recovery of accidentally deleted or lost files due to incidents.

fastService.title: Fast Service
fastService.description: We'll fix issues in the shortest possible time.

affordablePrices.title: Affordable Prices
affordablePrices.description: Our service prices are the most affordable on the market.

qualifiedStaff.title: Qualified Staff
qualifiedStaff.description: With over 15 years of experience handling all types of IT service challenges.

footer.description: We offer fast and affordable services for operating system reinstallation, data recovery, and hardware repairs. We care for your technological needs with professionalism and attention to detail.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Maistor Zhichko. All rights reserved.

cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience on this website. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our use of cookies.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Maistor Zhichko is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website.

dataCollection.title: What Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following information: name, email address, phone number, and other information you provide to us through the contact form or communication with us.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to: process requests and inquiries, communicate with you about our services, improve our website and services.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information only if required by law or with your consent.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Maistor Zhichko's website. By using our website, you agree to comply with the following terms of use.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms of use and all applicable laws and regulations.

services.title: Services
services.content: We offer electronics repair services. Prices, specifications, and service conditions may change without prior notice.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You are responsible for the accuracy of information you provide to us. You must not use our website for illegal or unauthorized purposes.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All materials on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, are the property of Maistor Zhichko and are protected by copyright laws.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Maistor Zhichko is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control their use.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences for a certain period of time.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies to: remember your language preferences, analyze website usage, improve website functionality and performance.

cookieTypes.title: Types of Cookies
cookieTypes.content: We primarily use functional cookies that are necessary for the basic functioning of the website, including remembering your language preferences.

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions regarding the use of cookies on our website, please contact us.
